title: JSON
summary: JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) is a data-interchange format. Although not a strict subset, JSON closely resembles a subset of JavaScript syntax. Though many programming languages support JSON, it is especially useful for JavaScript-based apps, including websites and browser extensions.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
